hero.name: Sahil Rzayev
hero.title: .NET Developer
hero.description: Backend / .NET Developer with strong experience in building scalable web applications using C#, ASP.NET Core, and Entity Framework. Skilled in RESTful APIs, SQL, Clean Architecture, and microservices. Familiar with Docker, Azure, Redis, Hangfire, and CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps. Passionate about cloud-native development, DevOps, and writing clean, testable code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Working with modern web technologies as a Backend / .NET Developer
about.description1: I am an experienced Backend / .NET Developer who builds scalable web applications using C#, ASP.NET Core, and Entity Framework. I have built a strong foundation in RESTful APIs, SQL, Clean Architecture, and microservices.
about.description2: I am familiar with Docker, Azure, Redis, Hangfire, and CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps. I am passionate about cloud-native development, DevOps, and writing clean, testable code.
about.description3: I focus on continuous learning and self-improvement. I follow new technologies and apply them in my projects. I value teamwork and enjoy contributing to open source projects.

current.title: Fullstack Developer
current.description: Developed modular web applications using ASP.NET Core and Angular JS. Built reusable UI components and implemented client-side filtering logic. Created dynamic reports with FastReport, including sub-report support. Designed RESTful APIs and optimized SQL queries for performance.

previous1.title: Fullstack Developer
previous1.description: Developed a restaurant automation solution featuring dual-screen functionality for cashier and customer interactions. Enabled real-time order management via RESTful APIs, improving efficiency.

previous2.title: Software Engineering
previous2.description: Graduated from Software Engineering department. Received comprehensive education in modern software development methodologies and technologies.
